title: Did Dick Van Dyke say: " We must stop a man who wants to be a dictator? '
subtitle: In an interview just prior to the 2016 presidential election, the 90-year-old comic actor made some harsh accusations against Republican candidate Donald Trump and his supporters.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Dick Van Dyke said about Donald Trump, "There are millions of people who share his anger, his madness, his hatred... I think we should stop a man who wants to be a dictator."
